trans-unit.source: Automatically generates single-table commands that are used to reconcile changes made to a <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"></xref> with the associated SQL Server database.
trans-unit.target: Gera automaticamente os comandos de tabela única que são usados para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref href="System.Data.DataSet"> </xref> com o banco de dados do SQL Server associado.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> does not automatically generate the Transact-SQL statements required to reconcile changes made to a <xref:System.Data.DataSet> with the associated instance of SQL Server.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>não gera automaticamente as instruções de Transact-SQL necessárias para reconciliar as alterações feitas em um <xref:System.Data.DataSet>com a instância associada do SQL Server.</xref:System.Data.DataSet> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create a SqlCommandBuilder object to automatically generate Transact-SQL statements for single-table updates if you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property of the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar um objeto SqlCommandBuilder para gerar automaticamente instruções Transact-SQL para atualizações de tabela única se você definir a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade de <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: Then, any additional Transact-SQL statements that you do not set are generated by the SqlCommandBuilder.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, qualquer instrução Transact-SQL adicionais que você não defina é geradas pelo SqlCommandBuilder.

trans-unit.source: The SqlCommandBuilder registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events whenever you set the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O SqlCommandBuilder se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos sempre que você definir o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.DataAdapter%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>

trans-unit.source: You can only associate one <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> or SqlCommandBuilder object with each other at one time.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode associar um <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>ou objeto de SqlCommandBuilder entre si de uma só vez.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>

trans-unit.source: To generate INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statements, the SqlCommandBuilder uses the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> property to retrieve a required set of metadata automatically.
trans-unit.target: Para gerar instruções INSERT, UPDATE ou DELETE, o SqlCommandBuilder usa o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>propriedade para recuperar um conjunto necessário de metadados automaticamente.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you change the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> after the metadata has been retrieved, such as after the first update, you should call the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> method to update the metadata.
trans-unit.target: Se você alterar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>depois que os metadados são recuperados, como após a primeira atualização, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>método para atualizar os metadados.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `SelectCommand` must also return at least one primary key or unique column.
trans-unit.target: O `SelectCommand` também deve retornar pelo menos uma chave primária ou coluna exclusiva.

trans-unit.source: If none are present, an **InvalidOperation** exception is generated, and the commands are not generated.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum estiver presente, uma **InvalidOperation** exceção é gerada e os comandos não são gerados.

trans-unit.source: The SqlCommandBuilder also uses the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> properties referenced by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O SqlCommandBuilder também usa o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>e as <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A>Propriedades referenciadas por <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Transaction%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Connection%2A>

trans-unit.source: The user should call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if one or more of these properties are modified, or if the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> itself is replaced.
trans-unit.target: O usuário deve chamar <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se uma ou mais dessas propriedades são modificadas, ou se o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A>será substituído.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, and <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> properties retain their previous values.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>, <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A>, e <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A>Propriedades retêm os valores anteriores.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.DeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.UpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.InsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you call <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, the SqlCommandBuilder is disassociated from the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>, and the generated commands are no longer used.
trans-unit.target: Se você chamar <xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>, o SqlCommandBuilder seja desassociado do <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>, e os comandos gerados não são mais usados.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Component.Dispose%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class with the associated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe com associada <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets the <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém o <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"> </xref> para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.Common.CatalogLocation"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Sets or gets a string used as the catalog separator for an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Define ou obtém uma cadeia de caracteres usada como o separador de catálogo para uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: A string that indicates the catalog separator for use with an instance of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que indica o separador de catálogo para uso com uma instância do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object for which Transact-SQL statements are automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"> </xref> objeto para o qual Transact-SQL instruções são geradas automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> registers itself as a listener for <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> events that are generated by the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> specified in this property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>se registra como um ouvinte para <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating>eventos gerados pelo <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>especificado nesta propriedade.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter.RowUpdating> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: When you create a new instance of <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, any existing <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> associated with this <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> is released.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria uma nova instância da <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>, qualquer existente <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>associado a esta <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>é liberado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter"></xref> object.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves parameter information from the stored procedure specified in the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> and populates the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*> collection of the specified <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Recupera informações de parâmetro do procedimento armazenado especificado no <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> e preenche o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>coleção especificada <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: `DeriveParameters` overwrites any existing parameter information for the `SqlDbCommand`.
trans-unit.target: `DeriveParameters`substitui quaisquer informações de parâmetro existentes para o `SqlDbCommand`.

trans-unit.source: `DeriveParameters` requires an additional call to the database to obtain the information.
trans-unit.target: `DeriveParameters`requer uma chamada adicional para o banco de dados para obter as informações.

trans-unit.source: If the parameter information is known in advance, it is more efficient to populate the parameters collection by setting the information explicitly.
trans-unit.target: Se as informações de parâmetro são conhecidas antecipadamente, é mais eficiente para preencher a coleção de parâmetros definindo explicitamente as informações.

trans-unit.source: You can only use `DeriveParameters` with stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Você só pode usar `DeriveParameters` com procedimentos armazenados.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `DeriveParameters` with extended stored procedures.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar `DeriveParameters` com procedimentos armazenados estendidos.

trans-unit.source: You cannot use `DeriveParameters` to populate the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection> with arbitrary Transact-SQL statements, such as a parameterized SELECT statement.
trans-unit.target: Não é possível usar `DeriveParameters` para preencher o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>com arbitrárias instruções Transact-SQL, como uma instrução SELECT com parâmetros.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Configuring Parameters and Parameter Data Types](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Configurando parâmetros e tipos de dados do parâmetro](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> referencing the stored procedure from which the parameter information is to be derived.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> referenciando o procedimento armazenado do qual as informações de parâmetro são derivada.

trans-unit.source: The derived parameters are added to the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*> collection of the <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Os parâmetros derivados são adicionados para o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>coleção do <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.Parameters*>

trans-unit.source: The command text is not a valid stored procedure name.
trans-unit.target: O texto do comando não é um nome válido de procedimento armazenado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetDeleteCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetDeleteCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetDeleteCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetDeleteCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetDeleteCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetDeleteCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetDeleteCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetDeleteCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetDeleteCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetDeleteCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> devem fazer exclusões de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform deletions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessária para realizar exclusões no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções SQL são geradas pela primeira vez quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetDeleteCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform deletions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessária para realizar exclusões.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetInsertCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetInsertCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetInsertCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetInsertCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetInsertCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetInsertCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetInsertCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetInsertCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetInsertCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL primeiro são geradas quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetInsertCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar as inserções de objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform insertions on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para executar as inserções no banco de dados.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>fins de método de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also use <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>como a base de um comando modificado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL primeiro são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetInsertCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform insertions.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto que é necessário para executar as inserções.

trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates on the database.
trans-unit.target: Obtém automaticamente gerado <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> necessário para executar atualizações no banco de dados de objeto.

trans-unit.source: An application can use the GetUpdateCommand method for informational or troubleshooting purposes because it returns the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand> object to be executed.
trans-unit.target: Um aplicativo pode usar o método GetUpdateCommand para fins de informação ou solução de problemas, porque retorna a <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>objeto a ser executado.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand>

trans-unit.source: You can also use GetUpdateCommand as the basis of a modified command.
trans-unit.target: Você também pode usar GetUpdateCommand como a base de um comando modificado.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call GetUpdateCommand and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar GetUpdateCommand e modificar o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the GetUpdateCommand will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o GetUpdateCommand ainda será usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or GetUpdateCommand.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL primeiro são geradas quando o aplicativo chama o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou GetUpdateCommand.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Generating Commands with CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object that is required to perform updates.

trans-unit.source: For example, you might call <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> and modify the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> value, and then explicitly set that on the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, você pode chamar <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>e modifique o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A>valor e, em seguida, defina explicitamente que em <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlDataAdapter> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand.CommandTimeout%2A> </xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the Transact-SQL statement is first generated, the application must explicitly call <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A> if it changes the statement in any way.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a instrução Transact-SQL é gerada pela primeira vez, o aplicativo deve chamar explicitamente <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>se altera a instrução de qualquer forma.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommandBuilder.RefreshSchema%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> will still be using information from the previous statement, which might not be correct.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>ainda estar usando informações da instrução anterior, que pode não estar correta.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Transact-SQL statements are first generated when the application calls either <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A> or <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.
trans-unit.target: As instruções Transact-SQL primeiro são geradas quando o aplicativo chama <xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>ou <xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A>.</xref:System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommandBuilder.GetUpdateCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbDataAdapter.Update%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default behavior, when generating parameter names, is to use @p1, @p2, and so on for the various parameters.
trans-unit.target: O comportamento padrão, ao gerar nomes de parâmetro, é usar @p1, @p2, e assim por diante para os vários parâmetros.

trans-unit.source: Passing `true` for the `useColumnsForParameterNames` parameter lets you force the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder> to generate parameters based on the column names instead.
trans-unit.target: Passando `true` para o `useColumnsForParameterNames` parâmetro permite que você force a <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>para gerar parâmetros com base nos nomes de coluna em vez disso.</xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbCommandBuilder>

trans-unit.source: This succeeds only if the following conditions are met: - The <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection has been specified and its length is equal to or greater than the generated parameter name.
trans-unit.target: Isso é realizada somente se as seguintes condições forem atendidas: - o <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção foi especificada e seu comprimento é igual ou maior que o nome de parâmetro gerado.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNameMaxLength>

trans-unit.source: - The generated parameter name meets the criteria specified in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection regular expression.
trans-unit.target: -O nome de parâmetro gerado atende aos critérios especificados no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>expressão regular da coleção.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterNamePattern>

trans-unit.source: - A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat> returned from the **GetSchema** method call and found in the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> collection is specified.
trans-unit.target: -A <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>retornado do **GetSchema** método chamar e encontrado no <xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation>coleção é especificada.</xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataCollectionNames.DataSourceInformation> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbMetaDataColumnNames.ParameterMarkerFormat>

trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [gerar comandos com CommandBuilders](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>, generate parameter names matching column names if possible.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>, gerar nomes de parâmetro de correspondência de nomes de coluna se possível.

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, generate @p1, @p2, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>, gerar @p1, @p2e assim por diante.

trans-unit.source: The automatically generated <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"></xref> object required to perform updates.
trans-unit.target: Gerado automaticamente <xref href="System.Data.SqlClient.SqlCommand"> </xref> objeto necessário para executar atualizações.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Given an unquoted identifier in the correct catalog case, returns the correct quoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador sem aspas no caso de catálogo correto, retorna o correto entre aspas a forma de identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly escaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui escape corretamente quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The original unquoted identifier.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas original.

trans-unit.source: The quoted version of the identifier.
trans-unit.target: A versão entre aspas do identificador.

trans-unit.source: Embedded quotes within the identifier are correctly escaped.
trans-unit.target: As aspas inseridas dentro do identificador corretamente são ignoradas.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the starting character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere inicial ou caracteres a ser usado ao especificar os objetos de banco de dados do SQL Server, como tabelas ou colunas, cujos nomes contêm caracteres como espaços ou símbolos reservados.

trans-unit.source: The starting character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caractere inicial ou caracteres a ser usado.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser alterada após uma inserção, atualização ou comando de exclusão foi gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the ending character or characters to use when specifying SQL Server database objects, such as tables or columns, whose names contain characters such as spaces or reserved tokens.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere de final ou caracteres a ser usado ao especificar os objetos de banco de dados do SQL Server, como tabelas ou colunas, cujos nomes contêm caracteres como espaços ou símbolos reservados.

trans-unit.source: The ending character or characters to use.
trans-unit.target: O caractere ou caracteres usar final.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma cadeia de caracteres vazia.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be changed after an insert, update, or delete command has been generated.
trans-unit.target: Essa propriedade não pode ser alterada depois que um insert, update ou delete comando tiver sido gerado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the character to be used for the separator between the schema identifier and any other identifiers.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o caractere a ser usado para o separador entre o identificador do esquema e de quaisquer outros identificadores.

trans-unit.source: Generally, database servers indicate the schema for a identifier by separating the schema name from the identifier with some character.
trans-unit.target: Geralmente, servidores de banco de dados indicam que o esquema para um identificador, separando o nome do esquema de identificador com alguns caracteres.

trans-unit.source: For example, SQL Server uses a period, creating complete identifiers such as Person.CustomerName, where "Person" is the schema name and "CustomerName" is the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o SQL Server usa um período, criando identificadores completos como Person.CustomerName, onde "Pessoa" é o nome do esquema e "CustomerName" é o identificador.

trans-unit.source: Setting this property lets developers modify this behavior.
trans-unit.target: Definir esta propriedade permite que os desenvolvedores modificar esse comportamento.

trans-unit.source: The character to be used as the schema separator.
trans-unit.target: O caractere a ser usado como separador de esquema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Given a quoted identifier, returns the correct unquoted form of that identifier.
trans-unit.target: Fornecido um identificador entre aspas, retorna a forma sem aspas correta do identificador.

trans-unit.source: This includes correctly unescaping any embedded quotes in the identifier.
trans-unit.target: Isso inclui unescaping corretamente quaisquer aspas inseridas no identificador.

trans-unit.source: The identifier that will have its embedded quotes removed.
trans-unit.target: O identificador que terá seus removidas as aspas inseridas.

trans-unit.source: The unquoted identifier, with embedded quotes properly unescaped.
trans-unit.target: O identificador sem aspas, com aspas inseridas corretamente sem escape.
